MemberSignature.Usage: new Microsoft.Azure.KeyVault.Models.CertificateAttributes (enabled, notBefore, expires, created, updated, recoveryLevel)

Docs.param: Determines whether the object is enabled.

Reflects the deletion recovery level currently in effect for certificates in the current vault. If it contains 'Purgeable', the certificate can be permanently deleted by a privileged user; otherwise, only the system can purge the certificate, at the end of the retention interval. Possible values include: 'Purgeable', 'Recoverable+Purgeable', 'Recoverable', 'Recoverable+ProtectedSubscription'
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the CertificateAttributes class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RecoveryLevel As String

Docs.summary: Gets reflects the deletion recovery level currently in effect for certificates in the current vault. If it contains 'Purgeable', the certificate can be permanently deleted by a privileged user; otherwise, only the system can purge the certificate, at the end of the retention interval. Possible values include: 'Purgeable', 'Recoverable+Purgeable', 'Recoverable', 'Recoverable+ProtectedSubscription'
